column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=It was a hard day , so I looked forward to making myself the perfect bath .
#id=2
#text=I get home from work and head straight for the bathtub .
#id=3
#text=I run the water until it 's the perfect temperature and plug the drain to allow the water to fill the tub .
#id=4
#text=I take some bath salts and oils to drizzle underneath the stream of water to allow it to dissolve and it fills the room with gentle fragrance .
#id=5
#text=As the tub continues to fill with water , I grab some candles and carefully place them around the tub .
#id=6
#text=After lighting the candles and setting up a towel and robe for getting out , I put on some quiet music to drown out the sound of my husband 's hockey game .
#id=7
#text=I grab a small towel to use as a pillow for my neck and finally get in the bath .
#id=8
#text=I feel like I 'm melting as I shut my eyes and allow myself to relax .
#id=9
#text=I do n't realize how long I 'm in there until I open my eyes and see my husband standing over me .
#text=The water has lost all its warmth .
#text=He had put the towel in the dryer and it was now warm , fluffy , and welcoming .
#text=I step out of the day as my troubles swirl down the drain .
